short_summary: P.1 Change Management Consultant, Department of National Defense - Short Summary: Provision of  services for P.1 Change Management Consultant, Department of National Defense.
description: The Department of National Defense (DND) requires the services of one (1) Change Management Consultant. The contractor must develop and deliver an electronic format of the product, to be distributed and accessible to all levels of staffing and job roles. One to six months. From the date of award. Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly, from the DND Point of Contact (DND POC), to the Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.  For more information about this opportunity, visit: https://buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders.
